### **2. "3 Questions to Ask Your Medicare Agent" Checklist (Episode 1)**

‚úì QUESTION 1: What are my important copays?

  ‚ñ° Specialist copay: $_____
  ‚ñ° Generic drug copay: $_____
  ‚ñ° Brand name drug copay: $_____

‚úì QUESTION 2: Are MY doctors covered?
  ‚ñ° Primary care doctor: [Name] _____ Yes/No
  ‚ñ° Specialist 1: [Name] _____ Yes/No  
  ‚ñ° Specialist 2: [Name] _____ Yes/No
  ‚ñ° Do I need referrals? Yes/No

‚úì QUESTION 3: Do I have a deductible?

  ‚ñ° Drug deductible: $_____
  ‚ñ° When does it reset? _____

NOTES:

### **3. "Medicare: The 3-Way Street" Decision Guide (Episode 2)**
**Why:** Helps users visualize path choices
**Content:**
- Visual comparison table
- Original Medicare path (pros/cons)
- Medicare Advantage path (pros/cons)
- Medigap path (pros/cons)
- "Which path fits YOU?" quiz
- Decision tree graphic

**Format:** 2-page PDF with graphics
**Priority:** üî¥ HIGHEST

---

## üìÑ **TIER 2: HIGH-VALUE PDFs (Create Next)**

### **4. "Medicare Terms Glossary" (Episode 3)**
**Why:** Reference guide for confusing terms
**Content:**
```
DEDUCTIBLE
What it is: Amount you pay before insurance kicks in
Example: $1,676 hospital deductible (2026)
When you pay it: Beginning of year, resets Jan 1

COPAY
What it is: Fixed dollar amount per service
Example: $20 doctor visit, $10 prescription
When you pay it: Each time you use the service

COINSURANCE
What it is: Percentage of total cost you pay
Example: 20% of $5,000 surgery = $1,000
When you pay it: After deductible is met

OUT-OF-POCKET MAXIMUM
What it is: Most you'll pay in a year
Example: $8,500 with Medicare Advantage
When it matters: Protects from catastrophic costs

DONUT HOLE (Coverage Gap)
What it is: Phase where you pay more for drugs
Example: Pay 25% from $5,030-$8,000 total drug costs
When you hit it: Depends on your drug costs

[+ 10 more common terms]
```

**Format:** 2-page PDF, alphabetical reference
**Priority:** üü° HIGH

---

### **5. "Complete Medicare Cost Worksheet" (Episode 7)**
**Why:** Helps users manually calculate costs
**Content:**
```
MY MEDICARE COST CALCULATION

STEP 1: List Your Doctors
Primary care doctor: _________ (visits/year: ___)
Specialist 1: _________ (visits/year: ___)
Specialist 2: _________ (visits/year: ___)

Estimated copays: $_____/year

STEP 2: List Your Prescriptions
Drug 1: _________ Tier: ___ Copay: $_____
Drug 2: _________ Tier: ___ Copay: $_____
Drug 3: _________ Tier: ___ Copay: $_____

Total annual drug cost: $_____

STEP 3: Expected Procedures
Planned surgery: Yes/No  Estimated cost: $_____
Regular tests: _________  Estimated cost: $_____

STEP 4: Premiums
Plan premium: $_____ √ó 12 = $_____
Part B premium: $185 √ó 12 = $2,220
Part D premium: $_____ √ó 12 = $_____

STEP 5: TOTAL ANNUAL COST
[Calculation table]

FINAL TOTAL: $_____/year ($_____/month)

Compare this to 2-3 other plans!
```

**Format:** 2-page PDF, Excel downloadable version
**Priority:** üü° HIGH

---

### **6. "Hidden Medicare Costs Checklist" (Episode 6)**
**Why:** Uncovers costs agents don't mention
**Content:**
```
‚ñ° Part B Premium ($185/month)
  Where it comes from: _____
  
‚ñ° Late Enrollment Penalty
  Are you subject to this? Yes/No
  Amount: $_____/month for life

‚ñ° Formulary Changes
  Has your drug changed tiers? Yes/No
  Cost increase: $_____

‚ñ° Out-of-Network Risks
  Do you travel frequently? Yes/No
  Have you had surprise bills? Yes/No

‚ñ° Not Covered by Medicare
  Hearing aids needed? Yes/No  Cost: $_____
  Dental work needed? Yes/No  Cost: $_____
  Glasses needed? Yes/No  Cost: $_____

TOTAL HIDDEN COSTS: $_____/year

Don't let these surprises hurt your budget!
Book review: YourMedGuy.com
```

**Format:** 1-page PDF checklist
**Priority:** üü° HIGH

### **11. Interactive Quiz: "What's Your Medicare Path?"**
**Why:** Engages users, provides personalized results
**Content:**
- 8-10 questions about:
  - Health status
  - Doctor preferences
  - Travel habits
  - Budget
  - Priorities
- Results: "You're a Medicare Advantage person" or "Medigap fits you better"
- CTA: Book consultation to confirm

**Format:** Web-based quiz (integrate with your site)
**Priority:** üü° HIGH

---

### **12. Doctor Network Checker Tool**
**Why:** Answers #1 question: "Are my doctors covered?"
**Content:**
- Search by doctor name + ZIP
- Shows which plans cover that doctor
- Network type (HMO, PPO, etc.)
- Referral requirements

**Format:** Web tool (API integration if possible)
**Priority:** üü¢ MEDIUM (complex to build)
